Text: This frame has yet to receive its final calibrations.
Even if you re-read the data afterwards, you would only experience it as the actions of another, not your own.
That is to say, after this battle...
...I will no longer be myself.

Even if you re-read the data afterwards, you would only experience it as the actions of another, not your own.
That is to say, after this battle...
...I will no longer be myself.
You would go to such lengths? Then I'll give you my all.
You will never hurt... Commandant!
I still... remember...
The times we all spent together... The awakening machines, and the infected Tifa.
I feel grave sadness for them... But there was nothing I can do, but to defeat them.
Are you trying to take me with you?!
If this is the only way!
Commandant, please allow me...!
I still remember... the sister who took care of me, and Camu who appeared after Kamui's corruption.
They dread this world because of the madness the virus brings.
So I told them what I learnt from Commandant.
You can't survive alone.
No matter how this battle ends, "you" will fade from this world, "you" will no longer exist——
Is not ending it here the best possible outcome?
I won't fade.
No matter what happens, I will always, always be with you, Commandant!
<color=#000000>Commandant—</color>
I wanted to escort the commandant out of here.
But it looks like... I...
It matters not if the merging halts!
I'll destroy the ARU. I'll get to live!
...Ugh!
Looks like that commandant is having some trouble in my M.I.N.D., ahahahaha!
End your pointless struggle. Then die!
I won't give up...!
Cough... Don't think I won't retaliate!
How, she's...!
But if I follow what Commandant says...
There!
...Ugh!
Ngh... It's too late!
Let's end it here!
FALL!
This is... within my striking range!
Stop that narwhal's wails! Stop!
It's not... OVER!!!
...Commandant, let's end this nightmare.

...Thanks.
I would like to think that... I made this decision myself.
Even if you refuse, I must end myself here.
Because I'm... Kowloong City's...
Even if I have to resort to violence...
I must keep you here...
I am the Alpha and the Omega. I am the arbiter. I am everything.
I am the cunning fox. I am the dreadful lion.
I buried Father. I built his kingdom.\nI released blood and the beasts sealed in Heaven. I crowned the champion.
To bring Father back to Earth, I crown the champion.
However, there is no champion here.
There was no champion last time, or the time before.
Every time, I destroy Father's city and rebuild it again.
Every time, I release blood and the beasts sealed in Heaven. I crown the champion.
It hurts! It hurts! It huuuurts!
Hehe... hehehe... You poor things, do you think that is it?!
I will crush you all!
Sink... till the bottom of this sea.
Everything crumbles and falls...
I... I can no longer go back!
Let the ocean bury you!
They will seek, understand,
and possess sentiments once only known to humankind.
They will learn, abolish,
and replace humanity's dated ideas of the world.

The will of the Punishing Virus has corrupted the Signal Orbs?!
Torrent<//FUSION>…… Hope <//DESPAIR>…
It's using the contaminated Signal Orbs as its power! Leave, Lucia!
Garghhh—!
Lucia!
Embrace <//REJECTION>... Annihilate <//REBIRTH>...
The Punishing Virus is gathering. At this rate...
I can... stop it...!
I entrust the hope to you, Lucia...
Give Liv back to us!
If only we could have peace soon, that'd be nice.
Then we could go on a trip together.
I will never change my decision no matter what.
I'll be by your side. That is our promise.
Will you hold my hand?
That is the most precious gift that I wish to have.
I am Lucia, and you're my commandant. That's all I need.
Let's walk forth together, Commandant.
Everything that we've been through becomes our memories and stays in our M.I.N.D.
I seem to start taking a liking of...
...If it's possible, I'd like to get mentally prepared for it...
So you are the commandant, huh... Just don't do anything stupid.
You don't have to cotton up to me.
...What are you looking at?
Are you available? How about we have a friendly contest?
I seem to have gotten used to you.
It just happened to be my shift today. I wasn't here waiting for you to return.
If you are in trouble, make sure to tell me. Don't carry all the heavy burdens by yourself.
I'm glad you are willing to learn more about me too...
Commandant... I'm Liv... I'm here to help.
Good morning, Commandant. Make sure not to miss a meal., Otherwise, your blood sugar level will drop.
Commandant, could you tell me more about... yourself?
I have been of use lately, am I not? I've been hard at work training my combat skills.
I'm glad to be so close to you, Commandant.
Meeting you is the best thing that has happened to me.
Huh? Are you scared of the dark? Well... I guess I'll keep you company for a little longer, then!
If it is possible, I hope I'll get to watch the sun rise and set with you sometime.
I have received more than enough precious gifts that I can treat as "memories."
Now it's my turn...
Now it's my turn to give everyone a "future" in return…
Random Portrait Switch
I'm Lucia, the captain of Gray Raven.
I'm Liv, from Gray Raven.
This is the climax!
I'm ready!
I don't know why I'm here either.
This poster is from a long time ago.
It seems to depict a character in a game.
For some reason, its colors have not faded over time.
The trash can is empty.
In a corner set off by the warm light...
The tables and chairs are scattered on the floor.
It's like people have just left after partying.
Warning... Leave...
All the Corrupted look like Constructs from Babylonia... What happened to them?
It seems to be a part that fell off from a big guy... This part is still salvageable.
Leads... to a brighter future...
Nanami wishes so too.
This is the ruin of a relay station.
Some signal units are still working.
Mothers... I discovered 3 more Mothers... T-they are all hatching already!
Get out of there! Retreat! Retreat!!!
The eastern front has fallen... The biological signals were a trick from the Hetero-Creatures... It's a trap...
Muffled screams come from the messy radio channel.
The apocalypse has manifested through countless pale human figures with the smell of blood and the Red Tide in the air.
—There is no longer a place that is safe on this planet.
Nanami once thought Babylonia would always stay somewhere in the sky, and Nanami's friends there would always watch over Nanami.
...But perhaps it is not inevitable.
The white bird stops before the destination that leads to a calamity.
The fire that once burnt up despair...
...Is turning into despair itself in the ashes.
Keep going!
Lithos: You want to eliminate Chiko?
You... shouldn't hold your weapon against your friend...
Didn't you hear her calling for help?
Let's go!
Female Construct：Gargh... They just keep coming.
Female Construct：Let me check the frame damage... Tsk, it needs some work done... Rookie, can you go ahead first? I'll be there soon.
Construct Soldier：Roger that!
Female Construct：...Ah! Dammit, how can I miss that...? Rookie! Rookie! Do you copy?! Dammit, the comms device is down.
Female Construct：...I have to turn on the radar now.
Female Construct：Gasp, I need to do my part too. Gotta keep the rookie alive.
Female Construct：Leave the rest to Uncle to decide. He'll figure it out.
Construct Soldier：Gasp... I found a way. I must contact her... now...
Construct Soldier：Hello? Hello? Do you copy? Why do I see radar signals over there?
Construct Soldier：Dammit... Is her device broken? I must be faster than her! Right, the signal tower! I'm sure the signals will be stronger and wider there!
Construct Soldier：Gargh... Ahhhhh...
Construct Soldier：Gargh, finally here... My voice module can't last any longer. I must turn on the signal tower to talk to her...
Construct Soldier：Signal tower... To broadcast the signals...
Construct Captain：Incoming comms? What is this...?
Construct Captain：Report your situation! What's going on? Why do I see your signal on the signal tower?!
Construct Captain：Is your voice module broken? I can't read the message. The image quality is too poor. Just move away from the tower. There are lots of... over there...
Construct Captain：What? I have to turn on the radar from remote? No...
Construct Captain：I found the corrupted device... Dammit... It's so close.
Construct Captain：Sigh... I wish you a sweet dream... on this summer night.
Arrgh…
And by a sleep to say we end the heart-ache and the thousand natural shocks that flesh is heir to…
'Tis a consummation devoutly to be wish'd.
Whether 'tis nobler in the mind to suffer the slings and arrows of outrageous fortune, or to take arms against a sea of troubles, and by opposing end them?
To be, or not to be, that is the question.
All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players.
'Tis now the very witching time of night, when churchyards yawn, and hell itself breathes out contagion to this world.
The rest is silence.

Detected multiple bullet holes and human DNA.
The gate was locked from the inside.
Human blood and generic vital fluid are detected in the stain. Based on the amount, it doesn't appear to be fatal, and the trail seems to be traceable.
A rickety defensive facility. A large amount of vital fluid can be detected on the ground.
Even more Corrupted are here.
It looks like the graffiti before... Are they connected?
Intel gathered
Start deducing
Corrupted entered from here
It appears to be barricaded from the inside to prevent Corrupted from entering.
Analyzing composition of residual substances... Human trajectory confirmed.
A mechanoid was defending against Corrupted here.
Obstruction failed, but it bought the human enough time to evacuate.
The human evacuated from here.
This graffiti... only appeared after this occurrence.
Warning! Warning!
The base has been breached! Everybody on guard!
Attempting to identify the invader... An Ascendant?!
Warning! Warning!
Abnormal Punishing Virus concentration detected.
Activating emergency plan. All personnel are to report to their positions immediately.
System: Protocol 343 in effect. The area remains sealed.
System: Please wait for the engineers to report the problem and cancel the protocol.
System: Activating Minos Cabin Gravity System.
System: System activated.
System: To optimize space utilization through deployment and operation.
System: Generating building structure graphics.
System: System demonstration activated.
System: Minos Cabin Gravity System uses artificial gravity
System: To optimize space utilization through deployment and operation.
System: This is the end of the demonstration.
System: Turning off the demonstration.
System: Activate Minos Cabin Gravity System.
System: Warning! Anomaly detected in the cabin!
System: Emergency isolation activated. Running continuous self-check.
Warning! Unauthorized armed unit detected in cabin 4. Security system activated.
System: All cabins authenticated. Allow use of the aisle cabin.
System: Deploying cabins...
I have long given up everything as a human the moment I became an Ascendant... except the indelible hate and pain.
But actually this is another thing that I can't forget—your birthday. It's the proof of your birth, and I'll always remember it.
Your birth made me your "sister," which is lucky for me.
Thank you for coming to this world, Luna.
3s subtitles
Recalibrating Visual Module >>>>>> 58.21%
Frame Damage >>>> 41.79%
Mobility Module Initializing...
Frame Emergency Reboot Completed
You turned away from your mentor's teaching that day. You let her sacrifice be in vain.
Yeah, but she told me not to make the mistakes she made.
What about me? I saved you, and I've been watching over you.
Are you going to betray me too?
The door to the train has opened. I have to get out of here quickly.
Have you always been running away from this powerlessness your whole life?
You shouldn't have turned down my gift.
Then give something better!
We can use the attacks of Lithos to open the train's door, like it did just now.
Thanks. This gift will come in handy.
How much longer are you going to run before you are willing to face your crime?
You no longer have a choice. There is only me here. You have to face me.
You should wake up from your dream!
May your past haunt you... forever... forever...
Mom?
Is she... pointing at the exit?
Noan, I hope you get to grow up and survive the apocalypse...
I hope you get to become who you want to be.
Captain Rachel...
Whatever future you want, don't make the mistakes I've made.
It'll be quite tragic if this is what we've been working toward and looking forward to.
Don't be afraid. People are still alive.
You die because you lived; you rot because you were.
Dying weeds often bear new lives. Why else would rotten grass bring about fireflies?
Noan... Look...
Spring will come. Snow will melt even if we don't use the books as fuel.
Goodbye, Shrek.
Goodbye... Goodbye! Noan, goodbye!
Live. Goodbye... Goodbye, Noan!
Goodbye... Goodbye! Noan, goodbye!
...Yeah... Goodbye...
Help... Help...
Why did you do this? You could have passed the filtering!
You should’ve accepted it... You should’ve saved me... Shrek!
Stay inside this cradle of glass.
I will build you a beautiful dream
But I've known how to wake myself up for a long time.
I'm sorry I've kept you here by yourself... You must be lonely.
I've brought you some friends.
Be a good boy. This is for your own good.
An air duct and a book storage room? Best match!
I can get out once I open it.
Help me... Help me...
I don't want to watch them hurt you anymore...
I'm just trying to protect you...
Don't go... Don't leave me...
It's late. You should go to bed... Stay.
Do you want to be like them?
No!
Naughty children need to be disciplined!
Now, it's the time for backstabbing.
Robert—!
System Alert: Large number of Hetero-Creatures and Corrupted detected ahead!
System Alert: Punishing Virus detected at 2 o'clock!
System Alert: Defense Tower 1 has been destroyed!
System Alert: Defense Tower 2 has been destroyed!
System Alert: Defense Tower 3 has been destroyed!
System Alert: Defense Tower 4 has been destroyed!
Defense System: Insufficient authorization. Please enter the emergency boot passcode.
Defense System: Booting successful. Locking on nearby Corrupted targets and initializing attacks.
Do you think this is how it ends?
I don't care what obsessions you have. I'll break every one of them.
I'm the guardian of this city.
Your arrogance will be your undoing, outsider.
Why don't you forget this place and pretend it didn't happen?
The corruption has evoked the pain hidden in M.I.N.D. All previous compromises have turned into knives.
They pierce the depth of her heart<//M.I.N.D.>, the dreams of yore too heavy to carry anymore...
Well...
But you now have what it takes to press forward with your dreams and walk out of this shelter—
Not to mention that you have someone right next to you who's willing to go through it with you, too.
This is... Commandant... It already worked.
Welcome back...
I'll end this nightmare once and for all.
Welcome to the Copperfield Aquarium. We hope you have a wonderful time here.
All "residents" at the Copperfield Aquarium have their own "meal" times.
You're welcome to share in those amazing moments.
The show "Cyborg Dolphins' Smiles" is about to begin.
Please take a seat and enjoy the show.
All dear visitors, please be advised that we will be closing soon.
Thank you for your visit today. We look forward to seeing you again.
System Alert: Unable to identify employee information. Connecting to AI Customer Service.
Dear esteemed guests, welcome to the Copperfield Aquarium.
This area is currently closed for repair. Please accept our apologies.
Our staff will enter the activation password as soon as the repair is complete. We appreciate your patience.
Copperfield Aquarium wishes you a wonderful day.
A yellowed poster was crumpled into a ball. It recorded the aquarium's completion date and a slogan "The World's Largest Ecological Underwater Aquarium."
There is a phrase hastily written on the other side with a permanent marker: Ugh! There's not a single fish in here! They're all fake!
A white paper was cut into long strips, which read: No pythons in the water tank! Beware of rabbits!
On its back is written: I'm a rabbit. Rabbits are yum yum.
A well-preserved voice recorder, but only gasps of fear were recorded.
Scenes from the past have emerged in front.
Help! Help me!
No need to be sad. We have new lives now...
This isn't what I wanted!
Come closer...
Run! Run as far as possible... No, Come! Come and kill me!
Sooner or later you'll become one of us...
The water curtain opened.
Illusions are not complete lies, behind which there is secret information.
Reality is not necessarily the truth, while traps are concealed from view.
The lamp has absorbed and projected some memories!
Gruff Voice: Leave!
Scenes from the past have emerged in front.
M.I.N.D. has been stabilized.
Wel... come...
Overlapping Voices: Run, run, run!
Run, run, run!
I'm not your enemy.
It's a guest. Welcome!
Go! Back to where you came!
I'm hungry...
Mama ate me, Papa ate Mama, Mama didn't digest, I'm stuffed—
Help! Help! Let me out!
Plushie, plushie, don't be sad—
Crying makes you beautiful. Let me give you a cut...
A half for me, a half for her... Upper half or lower half? Left half or right half?
Upper or lower? Left or right? Which half do you want to keep?
Toss away all weaknesses and shortcomings.
No one will hurt you. You'll be where you belong.
Come! Join us and be one.
Be one of us!
Join... us...
We've prepared a welcoming feast for you.
Break the shackles of flesh and the walls between hearts...
Open...
...Eyes...
Open... Eyes...
Open eyes!
Three phantoms have appeared.
...You've broken your word?
Your struggle is a waste of time.
Need to... go deeper?
As the whispers in darkness fade away, the vision is gradually brightening.
The food! The food has been stolen!
Good job... I must kill the little mouse!
I'm going to crush you, to kill you, to save you, to morn you!
Behold, the final light.
Impossible... Great!
Let me go... Kill me!
No... Thank you...
I declare the end of nightmare!
Set me free... I don't want to die...
Commandant...
I won't lose with your help.
I'll curse you!
Thank you for setting me free...
I must escape... Don't let me escape!
I still have things to do... Please end it now...
Save me... Kill me...
Miss, is everything okay?
Why! Why I have to do this myself!
Sorry, sorry, sorry!
Haha—Hahaha—Hahahaha!
It's not my fault. Not my fault! Don't come back to me!
I'm looking for you.
I'm looking for you.
Help me...
Kill me...
My friend.
The only one who understands me.
The only one who knows my weaknesses.
Together, we will...
Destroy this despairing world!
Restore this devastated world...
Do you know which one is her true wish?
I know.
I know... These are all her wishes.
Even at this point, her remnants of consciousness... are still protecting us!
Bianca...
Vanessa: Something's off.
Vera: This is way too "clean." It's almost like... someone is still living here.
Vanessa: Could it be those experimental Constructs on the trees outside?
Vera: Playing house here? Unlikely.
Bambinata: Wait... Someone is watching...
Bambinata: There.
Bambinata: No experiment items found.
Bambinata: But the layout of the walls here doesn't fully make sense... Not sure if they have been altered before.
Vanessa: So they've hidden the tracks of their experiments.
Vera: ...The door's here. Did you expect me to tell you this?
Vera: Surveillance? So we've been monitored by someone behind the camera ever since we walked into this place?
Vanessa: If there's surveillance equipment, there's a security room storing the footage. The data storage devices must still be running.
Vanessa: Let's see if there are any clues to the location of the security room.
Vera: Hey, look.
Vera: These dolls have something in their bellies.
Vera: The schedule here seems quite healthy.
Vera: Over here. Has this bear... been here all the time?
???: ...Come on.
Vera: Hey, stop zoning out, dollface!
Bambinata: The security room is in there.
Vera: Behind the shelf? How did you know that?
Bambinata: There is a strange memory... in Bambinata's M.I.N.D.
Vanessa: When did it show up?
Bambinata: Just now... Bambinata has scanned her frame, and no anomaly is found. But... Bambinata can "remember" someone passing through here.
Vanessa: Let's see if there's anything unusual about this bookshelf first.
Bambinata: Do we blow this place up, Mistress?
Vanessa: Let's avoid impacting the electronics and data with the explosions. We'll start with scanning it.
Vera: The shelf has electrical reactions as expected, but the activation requires admin authentication.
Vera: Can we find it in the memory?
Bambinata: Hmm... The data is not complete. Let Bambinata try to fix it.
Vanessa: Wait, let's be more careful. Establish a deep M.I.N.D. connection with me first, Bambinata.
Vanessa: And Cerberus, you keep an eye on things and help out Bambinata.
Bambinata: Broken memory data... Should be able to make it more consistent if Bambinata can adjust the time perception.
Bambinata: The core data that appears to be the administrator is standing by the bed. Is it time to rest?
Mother: Time, to rest. Sleep on time.
Mother: Good girl, ▇▇▇, rewarded. Have a, good dream, tonight.
Bambinata: ...
Bambinata: The same wooden horse... This memory must have taken place before the game time, I guess?
Bambinata: Something is missing... Mistress should be able to find it.
Bambinata: The time of the memory is not accurate enough.
Bambinata: Something is missing... Mistress should be able to find it.
Mother: Good children, tidy up toys. Otherwise, you'll become, naughty children.
Mother: Naughty children, will be, punished.
Bambinata: These memories... Is this where Bambinata used to live?
Mother: Game time, now. Good children, make use of, calculation module.
Bambinata: Mistress never told Bambinata about her past.
Vera: Hmm? Did I touch something by mistake? Sorry—
Vera: But you should stay lying down!
Bambinata: Resume data recovery.
Vera: Looks like someone's keeping a secret from you, dollface.
Vera: All eliminated.
Vera: That's it?
Bambinata: Data recovery complete.
Vanessa: Bambinata, investigate inside the building.
Bambinata: Yes, Mistress.
Vanessa: They look... more like they're running out from inside.
Vera: There seems to be something here that scares them.
Vera:Hm? It seems that I still have to adjust the clock.
Vera: The terminal only has the data track of the surveillance record. Someone has modified it.
Vanessa: There has to be something related to the experiment. Look deeper.
Bambinata: Bambinata can try to fix these data fragments like she did earlier.
Vera: With your external memory module?
Vanessa: Bambinata, stop if any error occurs.
Bambinata: Yes, Mistress.
Vera: What? The data download panel is over there.
Bambinata: I must not leave without Mistress' permission.
Bambinata: Successfully entered the recovery space.
Vanessa: Look for anything related to the experiment or architectural blueprints.
Bambinata: Understood.
Bambinata: Space recovery interrupted... Could there be a data deviation?
Bambinata: The recovered security room might have the information you need, Mistress... It's straight ahead.
Bambinata: What just flashed before me...?
Bambinata: It shouldn't be here. Looks like the items have to be matched with the correct data.
Bambinata: The data deviation is down.
Bambinata: Data deviation corrected, Mistress. Bambinata is off to the next area.
Bambinata: ...Mistress?
Bambinata: There it is, an architectural blueprint. Bambinata will immediately sync it to your terminal, Mistress.
Bambinata: Forming data connection...
Bambinata: Transmitting data...
Bambinata: Data transmission completed...
Vera: File transmission? It's the architectural blueprint. Your doll made it.
Vanessa: Good. Bambinata, you can stop for now.
Bambinata?: ...Come here... Come to "Mother"—
Vera: What did you say?
Bambinata?: There's a voice o-outside... outside. You should go c-check it out.
Vera: ...
Bambinata: Mistress? ...Communication channel interrupted. Have to find a way to get back to Mistress immediately.
???: ...Come on.
Bambinata: What are these...? Should they be in the data fragments by default?
Bambinata: This is... an abnormal data fragment?
Bambinata: It turns out that these data fragments are their memories...
Bambinata: Who are you? Did you interrupt the communication between Bambinata and Mistress?
Bambinata: The words on the barque... Should be left by the friend of the constructor of this building.
Bambinata: Being on the sea, sail. Being on the land, settle...
Bambinata: The corridor has changed?!
Bambinata: Being on the sea, sail. Being on the land, settle... Could the ship's bow indicate the direction to open the door?
Bambinata: Wait... Did I see this corridor before?
Bambinata: Was there a data deviation during the space recovery?
Bambinata: Am I back again? Or?
Bambinata: Mistress? Mistress?
Bambinata: ...Comms is unresponsive.
Bambinata: Bambinata needs to find the right way to the security room.
Bambinata: Who's there?
Bambinata: ...
Bambinata: The security room. Found it.
Bambinata: Who's there!
Bambinata: The security room... is not this way.
Vera: Dollface said it was not this way.

Strange sights are devouring the edges of the M.I.N.D.
He must think of a way to tackle everything here.
(Weird screams)
Lee?: Since we don't belong to the same world, I can't share much with you.
Lee?: I can't promise that what I've learned will apply to your situation.
Lee?: Too much information may lead to more errors.
Lee?: Trying to "fix" things arbitrarily might cause more problems. I'm sure you understand that.
Lee?: You must find your own answer, the most important part.
Lee?: Its clues can be anywhere.
Lee?: ...I'll leave the rest to you. Only you can do this.
Back to this place again...
But the answer to the unending corridor has been solved.
The only thing remaining is to reach the top of the tower.
The heavy fog is gone, and they finally reached the end of the river...
Scarlet data is flowing slowly on the dense sharp crystal spikes.
The platform broke into the weird space without invitation.
Familiar place, strange barrier.
Lee stands here once again after going through countless difficulties...
Possibilities from other timelines have entered Hyperreal's body...
Attracted by the core, the guards of the "tower" are emerging from the time rifts.
Possibilities from other timelines have merged in Hyperreal's body.
Lee is back to this place again... but will he be able to face the core this time?
A few hours after saving Liv...
Lee is out on a walk but still can't quiet his mind...
Hm? Is it raining?
Brother... Brother...
Where is my brother...?
Warning! Warning! Noncombatant personnel please take refugee immediately!
The quiet vibration has brought a slight change to the converging strings of fate...
This time... my bullets will definitely reach you.
And they will shatter your laughable imitations!
Hmph. Your imitation ability is just as I calculated.
You've been learning, comprehending, and imitating us.
Our response is to keep going and reach places you will never reach.
A storm struck the M.I.N.D...
But an area remains silent in the chaos.
No other "Lees" can be found here...
The memory resonates with the "Whirlpool". The memory deep in the M.I.N.D. starts surging...
—The clock hands start to move backward.
—The clock hands start to move forward.
???: The answer is not here. You failed. We all failed...
Attempt 231... I saw... the broken wings... and the feathers fell into the snow and mud...
...Waiting for the moment... to reach the unopened door... after the death of humans.
...Tell me your answer.
The hidden memories resonate once more.
The start of resolve. The desired future. Everything comes together once again.
But we have no choice but to move on, right...?
Me on the other side, with the <//PROSPECTS> of a brand-new frame.
Hold it tight and keep going...
The future... is in your hand...
